products_entries.full_product_description: M23 | Providing, installing, testing and commissioning of Plate electrode earthing station as per IS3043 including the following items  1.400(L)x400(W)x450(D)mm, 150mm thick block work inspection chamber with CI Cover/ Lid.  2. 600x600x3mm copper plate, 15mm GI line / funnel, 50mm line for watering , CI frame and CI cover,Salt & charcoal mixture,M10 bolts & nuts, universal stainless steel clamps. System shall be in full compliance with IS:3043 - 2018 Earthing Standards/ NBC 2016 (latest).  3. Cost to include 75x6 Cu. strips, 3meter lenght connecting clamps with copper plate, brass bolts & nuts as per standards.  4. Cost to include necessary excavation to an extent of 400(W & L), back filling around the Plate.
products_entries.size: inspection chamber: 400(L)x400(W)x450(D)mm, block work thickness: 150mm, copper plate: 600x600x3mm, GI(galvanized iron) line: 15mm, watering line: 50mm, copper strip: 75x6mm, connecting clamp length: 3 meter, excavation: 400(W & L)
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: standard: IS3043(indian standard 3043) - 2018, standard: NBC 2016(national building code 2016), inspection chamber cover: CI(cast iron), copper plate, GI(galvanized iron) line/funnel, CI(cast iron) frame and cover, salt & charcoal mixture, M10 bolts & nuts, universal stainless steel clamps, brass bolts & nuts, feature: back filling around the plate

products_entries.full_product_description: M24 | Providing, installing, testing and commissioning of earthing station including the following items  1.400(L)x400(W)x450(D)mm, 150mm thick block work inspection chamber with CI Cover/ Lid hinged to CI frame .  2. 100mm ID dia 13mm thick, CI pipe, watering funnel with wire mesh , Salt, charcoal,M10 bolts & nuts, universal stainless steel clamps ,  .  System shall be in full compliance with IS:3043-2018 Earthing Standards/ NBC 2016 (latest).  3. Cost to include necessary excavation to an extent of 400(W & L), back filling around the Rod/ Pipe.
products_entries.size: inspection chamber: 400(L)x400(W)x450(D)mm, block work thickness: 150mm, pipe diameter: 100mm ID, pipe thickness: 13mm, excavation: 400(W & L)
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: inspection chamber cover: CI(cast iron), CI(cast iron) pipe, watering funnel with wire mesh, salt, charcoal, M10 bolts & nuts, universal stainless steel clamps, standard: IS3043(indian standard 3043)-2018, standard: NBC 2016(national building code 2016), feature: back filling around the rod or pipe
